text: Burg bei Murten is a village and former municipality of the district of Broye in the canton of Fribourg, Switzerland. Since 1975 the municipality was incorporated into the larger, neighboring municipality Murten.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 9 February 2013 ==References== * Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg Category:Villages in Fribourg
